name: Battle Submarine
overview: Battle Submarine is a strategy game that puts players in control of a number of different submarines. The game is mission-based, and has players pursuing and sinking various nautical targets. The game is strategic, but occurs in real-time, and the player has to anticipate where their target will be and how best to ambush and destroy them. The game was released exclusively for the Super Famicom. It follows Pack-In-Video's earlier war simulation game, Super Dogfight.
